G

GeneralRepository - package GeneralRepository
This package contains all the information of the races' state, including all entities' state.
generateOdds() - Method in class GeneralRepository.Race
Method to generate the odds - each bet is generated considering the maximum step size of each horse, the less the step size, the bigger the odd.
generateOdds() - Method in class GeneralRepository.Races
